original_title: 极恶坊主 念佛三段斩
overview: In Meiji Period Japan, the carrying of swords had been outlawed, so Shikai, the Killer Priest carries his sword disguised as a Priest?s staff. One of the strongest entries in the series, Shinkai is badly injured, and must face his worst enemy in what could be their final showdown.
title: Wicked Priest 4: The Killer Priest Comes Back
